InsuranceClaimAsset.name: InsuranceClaimAsset
InsuranceClaimAsset.description: A junction object that associates the Claim object with the InsurancePolicyAsset object. You see this object only if you have enabled the Use Many-to-Many Relationships org pref.

ClaimId.description: The ID of the originating claim.

InsurancePolicyAssetId.description: The ID of the asset associated with this claim.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.
